name: Taco Omellete in Bellpepper
description: Indulge in a healthy, low-carb, and low-sugar breakfast delight with our Taco Omelette in Bell Pepper recipe. Perfect for those who enjoy Healthyfied versions of their favorite dishes, this recipe combines fresh vegetables, protein-packed eggs, and savory pork for a meal that doesn't skimp on flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the red onion and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the tops off the yellow and red bell peppers, remove the seeds, and set the peppers aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, beat the eggs together and add the marjoram, sage, salt, and ground pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet over medium heat, cook the pork until no longer pink, about 7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped red onion to the skillet and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the egg mixture into the skillet with the pork and onions, stirring gently to combine. Cook until the eggs are set, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Stuff the bell peppers with the egg and pork mixture, then place the peppers upright in a baking dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven until the peppers are tender, about 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
